effect:
Prism Armor reduces the damage taken from super-effective attacks by 25%. It is not affected by the abilities Mold Breaker, Teravolt, or Turboblaze.
For example, a Dark-type move used against a Psychic-type Pokémon with Prism Armor would deal 1.5× the usual damage instead of 2×. A double weakness would be reduced from 4× to 3×.
description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
